judgment_text:
IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY
 ORDINARY ORIGINAL CIVIL JURISDICTION
 Suit NO. 807 OF 1975
 Radhabhai A. Rachh & Ors. ... Plaintiffs.
 vs.
 Mansabai Meghji V. Rachh and ors. .. Defendants.
 CORAM: A.S. Aguiar J.
 Date: 18 /1 /2005
 Mr. M. V. Deshmukh, C.R. present.
 P.C.
 Widow of plaintiff no.4 prays for some more time to
 pay the security charges which according to the Court
 Receiver amounts to Rs.6,85,000/-.
 She states that an offer has been received for
 purchase of the property for a substantial amount and
 on finalisation of the same she will pay the balance
 amount.
 S.O. for one month.
 -2-
 (A. S. Aguiar J.)
